title: Fire station vaccine pop-ups to extinguish flu ‘wildfire’
description: Parents will be able to get their children protected against flu at a fire station this half term, as the NHS ramps up its winter vaccine campaign next week. title: Radical NHS reset to give patients faster care

title: England’s leading doctors set out medical training recommendations
description: Two of England’s leading doctors have set out their recommendations following the first phase of a review into postgraduate medical training. title: NHS to roll out first long-acting injection to prevent HIV
description: Around 1,000 people at risk of HIV will be offered a new long-acting injection on the NHS if they cannot have pills to protect them from the virus. title: NHS to screen all newborn babies for life-threatening metabolic disorder
description: Newborn babies will now be routinely screened and treated earlier on the NHS for a rare, life-threatening metabolic disorder, which can result in the need for a liver transplant.
